name: List View Mode for Supaslidev Dashboard
description: Add a grid/list view toggle to the presentation overview screen in the Supaslidev dashboard. Users can switch between a card-based grid layout and a compact list layout for viewing their presentations. The preference persists across sessions via localStorage.

userStories.title: Create PresentationListItem component
userStories.description: As a user, I want a compact horizontal row component for presentations so that I can see more presentations at once in list view.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `packages/supaslidev/src/components/PresentationListItem.vue`
Display status indicator (colored dot) showing running/stopped state
Display folder path in format `~/presentation-id`
Display title (truncated if too long)
Display theme badge (hidden on mobile via responsive classes)
Display duration badge (hidden on mobile via responsive classes)
Display icon-only action buttons for dev and export
Display port link when presentation is running
Reuse `useServers` composable and handlers from PresentationCard.vue
Apply terminal aesthetic with monospace font
Add green glow effect for running items
Add hover state with elevated background

userStories.title: Add view mode state and toggle UI
userStories.description: As a user, I want toggle buttons to switch between grid and list views so that I can choose my preferred layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Add `viewMode` ref with type `'grid' | 'list'` in App.vue
Default value is `'grid'`
Add UButtonGroup with grid and list toggle buttons between presentation count and "new" button
Grid button uses `i-lucide-layout-grid` icon
List button uses `i-lucide-list` icon
Active button shows `solid` variant, inactive shows `ghost` variant
Both buttons use `neutral` color and `sm` size

userStories.title: Persist view mode preference
userStories.description: As a user, I want my view mode preference to persist across browser sessions so that I don't have to re-select it each time.
acceptanceCriteria: Save view mode to localStorage when changed
Load view mode from localStorage on app initialization
Fall back to 'grid' if no saved preference exists
Use a consistent localStorage key (e.g., `supaslidev-view-mode`)

userStories.title: Implement conditional layout rendering
userStories.description: As a user, I want the presentation list to render in my selected view mode so that I see the appropriate layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Import PresentationListItem component in App.vue
Use TransitionGroup with dynamic name based on view mode
Apply grid classes when viewMode is 'grid': `grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-4 sm:gap-6`
Apply list classes when viewMode is 'list': `flex flex-col gap-2`
Dynamically render PresentationCard or PresentationListItem based on view mode
Switching views interrupts current animation and immediately switches

userStories.title: Add list view transitions
userStories.description: As a user, I want smooth animations when items appear/disappear in list view so that the UI feels polished.
acceptanceCriteria: Add list transition classes to `packages/supaslidev/src/style.css`
Transitions should be similar in style to existing card transitions
List items should animate on enter, leave, and move

userStories.title: Add dedicated open button for running presentations
userStories.description: As a user, I want a dedicated "open" button in the list item when a presentation is running so that I can quickly open it in the browser.
acceptanceCriteria: Add an "open" icon button (e.g., `i-lucide-external-link`) in PresentationListItem
Button only visible when presentation is running
Clicking opens the presentation URL in a new browser tab
Button is positioned near the port link for visual association
